lead_paragraph: About 15,000 people gathered today to commemorate the 10th anniversary of the bombardment and three-month siege of Vukovar -- a symbol of Croatian suffering from Serbian wartime brutality. About 1,700 Croats were killed when the Yugoslav Army and rebel Serbs overwhelmed the city after Croatia proclaimed independence.
abstract: About 15,000 people gather in Vukovar, Croatia, to commemorate 10th anniversary of bombardment and three-month siege of Vukovar--symbol of Croatian suffering from Serbian wartime brutality; photo (S)
